title: Dance with Pride at the Junction
description:
Clubbing night with special guests!

Dance with Pride is a one night LGBT spectacular, bringing together Cambridge’s best LGBT nightlife, new and old. Featuring the likes of Glitterbomb and the infamous Dot Cotton’s, it sure will be a night to remember! We will celebrate all things queer within the Cambridge community, creating a diverse, inclusive and above all fun night of entertainment and music.

Acts include: The Fleurettes, local Drag Celebrities, Short and Sweet (Cambridge based female DJ Collective), Chief Koala, The Legendary Dot Cotton Club, and more to be confirmed!

Dance with Pride is part of a series of events, Prelude to Pride, and aims to raise money and awareness for Cambridge Pride 2019. So get your dancing shoes on and come celebrate with us for Cambridge’s biggest LGBT night of the year! Early Bird Tickets available here: https://www.junction.co.uk/dance-with-pride?spektrix_bounce=true

*Please note, Early Bird discount is applied at checkout*

Dance with Pride and Cambridge Pride 2019 are supported by The Pink Festival Group.
